ngiemboon: À ně ńtóŋo yé, á zẅíŋ lê mmoon.
en: He agreed yes when he called him.
desire produced in the neck facing a good plate of food

ngiemboon: À gyǎ shúm léjÿó sɔ́ɔn lóŋ we gÿo lê mmɔ̀g.
en: He saw my meat and his neck went “mmɔ̀g”.

ngiemboon: Tè mɔ́ɔn ńzẅíŋe nò gie à gɔɔn.
en: Don't even accept what he says.
